trans-unit.resname: UGL·1 | Charm School | Card Name
UGL·1 | Charm School | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, choose a color and balance CARDNAME on your head.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME comes into play, choose a color and balance CARDNAME on your head.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·1 | Charm School | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage to you of the chosen color.
trans-unit.target: Prevent all damage to you of the chosen color.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·1 | Charm School | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME falls off your head, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: If CARDNAME falls off your head, sacrifice CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·2 | The Cheese Stands Alone | Card Name
UGL·2 | The Cheese Stands Alone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you control no cards in play other than CARDNAME and have no cards in your hand, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: If you control no cards in play other than CARDNAME and have no cards in your hand, you win the game.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·3 | Double Dip | Card Name
UGL·3 | Double Dip | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose another player. Gain 5 life now and an additional 5 life at the beginning of the next game with that player.
trans-unit.target: Choose another player. Gain 5 life now and an additional 5 life at the beginning of the next game with that player.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·4 | Get a Life | Card Name
UGL·4 | Get a Life | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player and each of his or her teammates exchange life totals.
trans-unit.target: Target player and each of his or her teammates exchange life totals.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·5 | I'm Rubber, You're Glue | Card Name
UGL·5 | I'm Rubber, You're Glue | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Speak only in rhyming sentences. If you do not, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: Speak only in rhyming sentences. If you do not, sacrifice CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·5 | I'm Rubber, You're Glue | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Say "I'm rubber, you're glue. Everything bounces off me and sticks to you": Target spell or ability, which targets only you, targets another player of your choice instead. (The new target must be legal.)
trans-unit.target: Say "I'm rubber, you're glue. Everything bounces off me and sticks to you": Target spell or ability, which targets only you, targets another player of your choice instead. (The new target must be legal.)

trans-unit.resname: UGL·6 | Knight of the Hokey Pokey | Card Name
UGL·6 | Knight of the Hokey Pokey | Card Text | Paragraph 1
UGL·6 | Knight of the Hokey Pokey | Card Text | Paragraph 2
UGL·6 | Knight of the Hokey Pokey | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: W, Do the Hokey Pokey (Stand up, wiggle your butt, raise your hands above your head, and shake them wildly as you rotate 360 degrees): Prevent all damage to CARDNAME from any one source.
trans-unit.target: W, Do the Hokey Pokey (Stand up, wiggle your butt, raise your hands above your head, and shake them wildly as you rotate 360 degrees): Prevent all damage to CARDNAME from any one source.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·7 | Lexivore | Card Name
UGL·7 | Lexivore | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME damages any player, destroy target card in play, other than CARDNAME, with the most lines of text in its text box. (If more than one card has the most lines of text, you choose which of those cards to destroy.)
trans-unit.target: If CARDNAME damages any player, destroy target card in play, other than CARDNAME, with the most lines of text in its text box. (If more than one card has the most lines of text, you choose which of those cards to destroy.)

trans-unit.resname: UGL·8 | Look at Me, I'm the DCI | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Look at Me, I'm the DCI
trans-unit.target: Look at Me, I'm the DCI

trans-unit.resname: UGL·8 | Look at Me, I'm the DCI | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ban one card, other than a basic land, for the remainder of the match. (For the remainder of the match, each player removes from the game all copies of that card in play or in any graveyard, hand, library, or sideboard.)
trans-unit.target: Ban one card, other than a basic land, for the remainder of the match. (For the remainder of the match, each player removes from the game all copies of that card in play or in any graveyard, hand, library, or sideboard.)

trans-unit.resname: UGL·9 | Mesa Chicken | Card Name
UGL·9 | Mesa Chicken | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Stand up, Flap your arms, Cluck like a chicken: CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Stand up, Flap your arms, Cluck like a chicken: CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·10 | Miss Demeanor | Card Name
UGL·10 | Miss Demeanor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
UGL·10 | Miss Demeanor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: During each other player's turn, compliment that player on his or her game play or sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: During each other player's turn, compliment that player on his or her game play or sacrifice CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·11 | Once More with Feeling | Card Name
UGL·11 | Once More with Feeling | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove CARDNAME from the game as well as all cards in play and in all graveyards. Each player shuffles his or her hand into her or his library, then draws seven cards. Each player's life total is set to 10.
trans-unit.target: Remove CARDNAME from the game as well as all cards in play and in all graveyards. Each player shuffles his or her hand into her or his library, then draws seven cards. Each player's life total is set to 10.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·11 | Once More with Feeling | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: DCI ruling: This card is restricted. (You cannot play with more than one in a deck.)
trans-unit.target: DCI ruling: This card is restricted. (You cannot play with more than one in a deck.)

trans-unit.resname: UGL·12 | Prismatic Wardrobe | Card Name
UGL·12 | Prismatic Wardrobe | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target card that does not share a color with clothing worn by its controller. You cannot choose an artifact or land card.
trans-unit.target: Destroy target card that does not share a color with clothing worn by its controller. You cannot choose an artifact or land card.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·13 | Sex Appeal | Card Name
UGL·13 | Sex Appeal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent up to 3 damage total to any number of creatures and/or players. If there are more players in the room of the opposite sex, prevent up to 3 additional damage total to any number of creatures and/or players.
trans-unit.target: Prevent up to 3 damage total to any number of creatures and/or players. If there are more players in the room of the opposite sex, prevent up to 3 additional damage total to any number of creatures and/or players.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·14 | Bureaucracy | Card Name
UGL·14 | Bureaucracy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Pursuant to subsection 3.1(4) of Richard's Rules of Order, during the upkeep of each participant in this game of the Magic: The Gathering® trading card game (hereafter known as "PLAYER"), that PLAYER performs all actions in the sequence of previously added actions (hereafter known as "ACTION QUEUE"), in the order those actions were added, then adds another action to the end of the ACTION QUEUE. All actions must be simple physical or verbal actions that a player can perform while sitting in a chair, without jeopardizing the health and security of said PLAYER.
trans-unit.target: Pursuant to subsection 3.1(4) of Richard's Rules of Order, during the upkeep of each participant in this game of the Magic: The Gathering® trading card game (hereafter known as "PLAYER"), that PLAYER performs all actions in the sequence of previously added actions (hereafter known as "ACTION QUEUE"), in the order those actions were added, then adds another action to the end of the ACTION QUEUE. All actions must be simple physical or verbal actions that a player can perform while sitting in a chair, without jeopardizing the health and security of said PLAYER.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·14 | Bureaucracy | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If any PLAYER does not perform all the prescribed actions in the correct order, sacrifice CARDNAME and said PLAYER discards his or her complement of cards in hand (hereafter known as "HAND").
trans-unit.target: If any PLAYER does not perform all the prescribed actions in the correct order, sacrifice CARDNAME and said PLAYER discards his or her complement of cards in hand (hereafter known as "HAND").

trans-unit.resname: UGL·15 | Censorship | Card Name
UGL·15 | Censorship | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, choose a CENSORED word.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME comes into play, choose a CENSORED word.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·15 | Censorship | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever any CENSORED player says the chosen CENSORED word, CARDNAME deals 2 CENSORED damage to him or her.
trans-unit.target: Whenever any CENSORED player says the chosen CENSORED word, CARDNAME deals 2 CENSORED damage to him or her.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·16 | Checks and Balances | Card Name
UGL·16 | Checks and Balances | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever any spell is played, counter that spell if each player, other than the caster and his or her teammates, agrees to choose and discard a card. Those players must discard those cards after agreeing.
trans-unit.target: Whenever any spell is played, counter that spell if each player, other than the caster and his or her teammates, agrees to choose and discard a card. Those players must discard those cards after agreeing.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·16 | Checks and Balances | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME may be played only in a game with three or more players.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME may be played only in a game with three or more players.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·17 | Chicken à la King | Card Name
UGL·17 | Chicken à la King | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a 6 is rolled on a six-sided die, put a +1/+1 counter on each Chicken in play. (You may roll dice only when a card instructs you to.)
trans-unit.target: Whenever a 6 is rolled on a six-sided die, put a +1/+1 counter on each Chicken in play. (You may roll dice only when a card instructs you to.)

trans-unit.resname: UGL·17 | Chicken à la King | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Tap a Chicken you control: Roll a six-sided die.
trans-unit.target: Tap a Chicken you control: Roll a six-sided die.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·18 | Clambassadors | Card Name
UGL·18 | Clambassadors | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME damages any player, choose an artifact, creature, or land you control. That player gains control of that artifact, creature, or land.
trans-unit.target: If CARDNAME damages any player, choose an artifact, creature, or land you control. That player gains control of that artifact, creature, or land.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·19 | Clam-I-Am | Card Name
UGL·19 | Clam-I-Am | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you roll a 3 on a six-sided die, you may reroll that die.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you roll a 3 on a six-sided die, you may reroll that die.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·20 | Clam Session | Card Name
UGL·20 | Clam Session | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, choose a word.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME comes into play, choose a word.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·20 | Clam Session | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, sing at least six words of a song, one of which must be the chosen word, or sacrifice CARDNAME. You cannot repeat a song.
trans-unit.target: During your upkeep, sing at least six words of a song, one of which must be the chosen word, or sacrifice CARDNAME. You cannot repeat a song.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·21 | Common Courtesy | Card Name
UGL·21 | Common Courtesy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter any spell unless its caster asks your permission to play that spell. If you refuse permission, Sacrifice CARDNAME and counter the spell.
trans-unit.target: Counter any spell unless its caster asks your permission to play that spell. If you refuse permission, Sacrifice CARDNAME and counter the spell.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·22 | Denied! | Card Name
UGL·22 | Denied! | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Play Denied only as any opponent casts target spell. Name a card, then look at all cards in that player's hand. If the named card is in the player's hand, counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: Play Denied only as any opponent casts target spell. Name a card, then look at all cards in that player's hand. If the named card is in the player's hand, counter target spell.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·23 | Double Take | Card Name
UGL·23 | Double Take | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose another player. Draw two cards now and draw an additional two cards at the beginning of the next game with that player.
trans-unit.target: Choose another player. Draw two cards now and draw an additional two cards at the beginning of the next game with that player.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·24 | Fowl Play | Card Name
UGL·24 | Fowl Play | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a 1/1 creature that counts as a Chicken.
trans-unit.target: Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a 1/1 creature that counts as a Chicken.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·25 | Free-for-All | Card Name
UGL·25 | Free-for-All | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, set aside all creatures in play, face down.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME comes into play, set aside all creatures in play, face down.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·25 | Free-for-All | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: During each player's upkeep, that player chooses a creature card at random from those set aside in this way and puts that creature into play under his or her control.
trans-unit.target: During each player's upkeep, that player chooses a creature card at random from those set aside in this way and puts that creature into play under his or her control.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·25 | Free-for-All | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME leaves play, put each creature still set aside this way into its owner's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: If CARDNAME leaves play, put each creature still set aside this way into its owner's graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·26 | Psychic Network | Card Name
UGL·26 | Psychic Network | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player reveals the top card of his or her library to all other players by continuously holding it against his or her forehead. This does not allow a player to look at his or her own card. (That card still counts as the top card of your library. Whenever you draw a card, draw that one and replace it with the next card of your library.)
trans-unit.target: Each player reveals the top card of his or her library to all other players by continuously holding it against his or her forehead. This does not allow a player to look at his or her own card. (That card still counts as the top card of your library. UGL·27 | Sorry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Before playing any spell, if a copy of that spell card is in any graveyard, the spell's caster may say "CARDNAME." If he or she does not, any other player may counter the spell by saying "CARDNAME" as it is cast.

trans-unit.source: T: Put CARDNAME and two lands you control face down in front of target opponent after revealing each card to him or her. Then, rearrange the order of the three cards as often as you wish, keeping them on the table at all times. That opponent then chooses one of those cards. If a land is chosen, destroy target card in play. Otherwise, sacrifice CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·50 | Ricochet | Card Name
UGL·50 | Ricochet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever any spell targets a single player, each player rolls a six-sided die. That spell is redirected to the player or players with the lowest die roll. If two or more players tie for the lowest die roll, they reroll until there is no tie.
trans-unit.target: Whenever any spell targets a single player, each player rolls a six-sided die. That spell is redirected to the player or players with the lowest die roll. If two or more players tie for the lowest die roll, they reroll until there is no tie.

trans-unit.source: G: Roll two six-sided dice. If both die rolls are the same, CARDNAME gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number rolled on each die. Otherwise, if the total rolled is equal to any other total you have rolled this turn for CARDNAME, sacrifice it. (For example, if you roll two 3s, CARDNAME gets +3/+3. If you roll a total of 6 for CARDNAME later in that turn, sacrifice it.)
